short: Overall, total revenue up 20.00%, DAU up 15.30%.
long:
Key highlights for the period:
- Total revenue increased by 20.00% compared to the previous period.
- Daily Active Users increased by 15.30%.
- Average Revenue Per User improved by 8.50%.
- Gift volume increased by 25.20%.
- Safety score remained stable at 88.5%.

insights.description: Total revenue increased by 20.00% compared to the previous period.
Average Revenue Per User improved by 8.50%.
